original_text: And the lot of the children of Joseph fell from Jordan by Jericho, unto the water of Jericho on the east, to the wilderness that goeth up from Jericho throughout mount Bethel,
korean_text: 요셉 자손이 제비 뽑은 것은 여리고 샘 동쪽 곧 여리고 곁 요단으로부터 광야로 들어가 여리고로부터 벧엘 산지로 올라가고

sentences.original_text: And the lot of the children of Joseph fell
unto the water of Jericho on the east
to the wilderness that goeth up from Jericho
